title: Chronicles of the Beginning of Love - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Mature   School Life   Slice of Life   Smut   Yaoi
tags: Incest   Modern Day   R*pe   Threesome   Twins
author: Silver Bullet   银色子弹
description:
Qiu Huaijun doesn’t do as he’s told to do; his body is often covered with wounds. 

His seventeen-year-old gaze like that of a young dog; dried orange peels, the dim sunlight covered by the curtains; intimately, ambiguously, kissing, crying and shouting and sweating; to lose oneself in. 

“A perpetual enchantment with your indecency.”>
